mapper.insert: insert into ${tableName} (id, device_code, alarm_status, vehicle_status, lat, lon, height, speed, direction, time, mile, oil, speed2, signal_status, bst, io_status, analog, wifi, satellite_num, create_time, vendor_code) values (#{trail.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trail.deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trail.alarmStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trail.vehicleStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trail.lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{trail.lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{trail.height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{trail.speed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{trail.direction,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{trail.time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trail.mile,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{trail.oil,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{trail.speed2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{trail.signalStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trail.bst,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trail.ioStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trail.analog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trail.wifi,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trail.satelliteNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trail.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{trail.vendorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, device_code, alarm_status, vehicle_status, lat, lon, height, speed, direction, time, mile, oil, speed2, signal_status, bst, io_status, analog, wifi, satellite_num, create_time, vendor_code, alarm_handle from ${tableName}

select id, device_code, alarm_status, vehicle_status, lat, lon, height, speed, direction, time, mile, oil, speed2, signal_status, bst, io_status, analog, wifi, satellite_num, create_time, vendor_code, alarm_handle from ${tableName} where device_code = #{deviceCode} and time >= #{beginTime} and time <= #{endTime} and alarm_handle = #{alarmHandle} order by time
